00025 /* Include autoconf 'config.h' */
00026 #if HAVE_CONFIG_H
00027 #include "config.h"
00028 #endif /* HAVE_CONFIG_H */
00029 
00030 #include <stdlib.h>
00031 #include <string.h>
00032 #include "debug.h"
00033 #include "interface.h"
00034 #include "rsXXX.h" 
00035 
00036 #define DEFAULT_TIMEOUT_S               2       /**< Default timeout for reading from interface (in seconds) */
00037 #define DEFAULT_TIMEWAIT_MS             50  /**< Default time to wait for reply from board (milliseconds) */
00038 
00039 int tmcl_init_interface(TMCLInterface **iface, TMCLBusType bus, tmcl_open_funcPtr open_func, tmcl_close_funcPtr close, tmcl_read_funcPtr read, tmcl_write_funcPtr write) {
00040 
00041         *iface = (TMCLInterface*)malloc(sizeof(TMCLInterface));
00042         
00043         if(*iface == NULL)
00044                 return -1;
00045         
00046     (*iface)->bus = bus;
00047     (*iface)->timeout_sec   = DEFAULT_TIMEOUT_S;
00048     (*iface)->timeout_msec  = 0;
00049     (*iface)->timewait_sec  = 0;
00050     (*iface)->timewait_msec = DEFAULT_TIMEWAIT_MS;
00051     
00052     (*iface)->tmcl_open_void = NULL;
00053     (*iface)->tmcl_close_void = NULL;
00054     (*iface)->tmcl_read_void = NULL;
00055     (*iface)->tmcl_write_void = NULL;
00056     
00057     /* First set default open, close, ... functions */
00058     switch(bus) {
00059     case TMCL_RSXXX:
00060         (*iface)->_open = tmcl_open_rsXXX;
00061         (*iface)->_close = tmcl_close_rsXXX;
00062         (*iface)->_write = tmcl_write_rsXXX;
00063         (*iface)->_read = tmcl_poll_rsXXX;
00064         break;
00065     case TMCL_CAN:
00066     case TMCL_IIC:
00067         /* Currently unsupported */
00068         return -1;
00069         (*iface)->_open = NULL;
00070         (*iface)->_close = NULL;
00071         (*iface)->_write = NULL;
00072         (*iface)->_read = NULL;
00073     default: /* Unupported bus */
00074         return -1;
00075     }
00076 
00077     /* Now override with custom ones if desired */
00078     if (open_func != NULL)
00079         (*iface)->_open = open_func;
00080     if(close != NULL)
00081         (*iface)->_close = close;
00082     if(write != NULL)
00083         (*iface)->_write = write;
00084     if(read != NULL)
00085         (*iface)->_read = read;
00086     
00087     return 0;
00088 
00089 }
00090 
00091 void tmcl_set_open_data(TMCLInterface *iface, void *pointer) {
00092     iface->tmcl_open_void = pointer;
00093 }
00094 
00095 void tmcl_set_close_data(TMCLInterface *iface, void *pointer) {
00096     iface->tmcl_close_void = pointer;
00097 }
00098 
00099 void tmcl_set_read_data(TMCLInterface *iface, void *pointer) {
00100     iface->tmcl_read_void = pointer;
00101 }
00102 
00103 void tmcl_set_write_data(TMCLInterface *iface, void *pointer) {
00104     iface->tmcl_write_void = pointer;
00105 }
00106 
00107 void tmcl_deinit_interface(TMCLInterface **iface) {
00108         
00109         free(*iface);
00110         
00111 }
00112 
00113 int tmcl_open_interface(TMCLInterface *iface, const char *filename) {
00114 
00115     int ret = 0;
00116 
00117     ret = iface->_open(iface, filename, iface->tmcl_open_void);
00118     iface->ifacename = malloc(strlen(filename));
00119     
00120     if(iface->ifacename != NULL)
00121         strncpy(iface->ifacename, filename, strlen(filename));
00122     else 
00123         return -1;
00124     
00125     DEBUG("open_interface() returns %d for %s\n", ret, iface->ifacename);
00126 
00127     return ret;
00128 }
00129 
00130 int tmcl_close_interface(TMCLInterface *iface) {
00131 
00132     int ret;
00133 
00134     ret = iface->_close(iface, iface->tmcl_close_void);
00135     free(iface->ifacename);
00136     
00137     DEBUG("close_interface() returns %d\n", ret);
00138 
00139     return ret;
00140 }
00141 
00142 /* Set timeout for reading from interface */
00143 void tmcl_interface_set_timeout(TMCLInterface *iface, unsigned int sec, unsigned int msec) {
00144 
00145         iface->timeout_sec  = sec;
00146         iface->timeout_msec = msec;
00147         
00148 }
00149 
00150 /* Set timeout for waiting for reply of interface to be present */
00151 void tmcl_interface_set_timewait(TMCLInterface *iface, unsigned int sec, unsigned int msec) {
00152 
00153         iface->timewait_sec  = sec;
00154         iface->timewait_msec = msec;
00155                 
00156 }
